data.text: @GGrasic It is a sad reflection of how higher active cases lead to higher rates of deaths . . . So awful 🙏

@mountainash04 We currently have an average 5,000-7,000 new Covid cases a day. We did  not have such high Nos in 2020 & 2021

I suspect Covid deaths are from infected non vaxxed persons, immunocompromised, persons with risk factors & a No who for no known reason are adversely affected by C19

@Mirella_PhD The figs. are surprisingly high this year compared to 2021/20 and confounding. If AC deaths are <20% who are the vulnerable currently at risk? Privacy I know, but the figs. are perplexing and seem to contradict the assertion that Omicron is milder than Delta. Many thanks Mirella.
@Mirella_PhD I can’t put a heart…. But letting you know, Mirella, I appreciate your informative posts. This one’s for you,♥️

@Mirella_PhD This is unbelievable!!! The average rates of lives lost needs to be known widely!! This is disgusting!!

Thanks so much for posting this!! 🙏💐💝
